coreAttributes.authorTag: 'Woven by the DSG Textile Guild' in very small print is woven in one corner.
coreAttributes.name: embroidered sign
coreAttributes.description: A folded up piece of rectangular canvas fabric embroidered with a design that Monica had made for you based on your interpretation of the qualities that Eisek values most in his goods.

effectTooltipLines.line: One of [style.colourGood(three)] items that you need to fix up Eisek's stall.

coreAttributes.applyEffects: This sign is made from canvas, rolled at the edges for durability. Embroidered on its otherwise featureless surface is a stylized depiction of many different types of fruits and vegetables carried by an avalanche descending down the side of a mountain. In the upper right, the words "ALPINE PRODUCE" are similarly sewn in with metallic blue thread.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfold)] the sign to get a closer look...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfold)] the sign to show it off to [npc2.name], who [npc.verb(lean)] in to get a closer look...
